storyTitle: As Administrator, I want to generate audit reports for schedule change approvals to achieve compliance and transparency

testCases.title: Generate audit report with filters
preconditions: Administrator is logged into the system with valid credentials
Approval audit logs contain data for the selected date range
At least one approver exists in the system with approval history

steps.action: Navigate to the audit reporting module from the admin dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Audit reporting module page loads successfully with report generation options visible

steps.action: Select a date range filter by choosing start date and end date from the date picker
steps.expectedResult: Selected date range is displayed correctly in the date range field

steps.action: Select one or more approvers from the approver dropdown filter
steps.expectedResult: Selected approver names are displayed in the approver filter field

steps.action: Verify that the filters are applied correctly by reviewing the filter summary section
steps.expectedResult: Filter summary displays the selected date range and approver names accurately

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Report displays filtered approval actions including action type, timestamp, approver name, status, and comments for the selected criteria

steps.action: Verify that only approval actions matching the selected filters are displayed in the report
steps.expectedResult: All displayed records match the date range and approver filters applied, with no unrelated records shown

postconditions: Audit report is generated and displayed on screen
Report contains only filtered data matching the selected criteria
Report is available for export or further actions
Audit log records the report generation activity

testCases.title: Export audit report in PDF and Excel
preconditions: Administrator is logged into the system with valid credentials
An audit report has been generated and is displayed on screen
System has PDF and Excel export functionality enabled

steps.action: Locate the export options section on the generated audit report page
steps.expectedResult: Export options are visible with PDF and Excel format buttons available

steps.action: Click the 'Export as PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF generation and displays a processing indicator

steps.action: Wait for PDF file to be generated and downloaded
steps.expectedResult: PDF file downloads successfully to the default download location with a filename containing 'audit_report' and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully and displays the audit report with all approval actions, timestamps, approver names, statuses, and comments in a properly formatted layout

steps.action: Verify that the PDF contains correct data matching the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: All data in the PDF matches the generated report exactly, including headers, filters applied, and record details

steps.action: Return to the audit report page and click the 'Export as Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel generation and displays a processing indicator

steps.action: Wait for Excel file to be generated and downloaded
steps.expectedResult: Excel file downloads successfully to the default download location with a filename containing 'audit_report' and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file using a spreadsheet application
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully and displays the audit report data in a structured spreadsheet format with proper column headers

steps.action: Verify that the Excel file contains correct data matching the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: All data in the Excel file matches the generated report exactly, with each approval action in a separate row and all fields in appropriate columns

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate audit report data
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains accurate audit report data
Both exported files are accessible and readable
Export activities are logged in the system audit trail

testCases.title: Schedule automated audit report delivery
preconditions: Administrator is logged into the system with valid credentials
Email service is configured and operational
At least one valid recipient email address is available

steps.action: Navigate to the audit reporting module and locate the 'Schedule Report' option
steps.expectedResult: Schedule Report button or link is visible and clickable

steps.action: Click on the 'Schedule Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Schedule configuration dialog or page opens with fields for schedule settings and recipient configuration

steps.action: Configure report schedule by selecting frequency (daily, weekly, monthly) and specific time for report generation
steps.expectedResult: Selected frequency and time are displayed correctly in the schedule configuration fields

steps.action: Select report format (PDF, Excel, or both) for the scheduled delivery
steps.expectedResult: Selected format options are highlighted and confirmed in the configuration

steps.action: Enter recipient email addresses in the recipients field, separating multiple addresses with commas or semicolons
steps.expectedResult: All entered email addresses are displayed and validated as properly formatted

steps.action: Configure optional filters for the scheduled report (date range, approver, status)
steps.expectedResult: Selected filters are applied and displayed in the schedule configuration summary

steps.action: Review the schedule configuration summary showing all settings
steps.expectedResult: Summary displays frequency, time, format, recipients, and filters accurately

steps.action: Click the 'Save Schedule' button
steps.expectedResult: System displays a success message confirming that the schedule has been saved successfully

steps.action: Verify that the scheduled report appears in the list of active scheduled reports
steps.expectedResult: Newly created schedule is listed with correct configuration details including next scheduled run time

steps.action: Wait for the configured scheduled time to arrive (or manually trigger the schedule for testing purposes)
steps.expectedResult: System automatically generates the audit report at the configured time

steps.action: Check that the system sends the scheduled report via email to all configured recipients
steps.expectedResult: All recipients receive an email with the audit report attached in the specified format(s) within 5 minutes of the scheduled time

steps.action: Verify email content by opening the received email
steps.expectedResult: Email contains appropriate subject line, body text explaining the scheduled report, and correct attachment(s) with accurate audit data

postconditions: Scheduled report configuration is saved in the system
Schedule appears in the active schedules list
Recipients receive the audit report via email at the configured time
Email delivery is logged in the system
Schedule remains active for future executions unless disabled
